Title: Early Home Care of Second Trimester Medical Abortion Is Safe
Teaser: In the home care group, 71% of the participants later spent fewer than 9 hours in hospital vs 46% of the hospital group.

Title: Boosting Thiazide Dosage Can Reduce Kidney Stone Risk
Teaser: Increased thiazide doses were associated with a greater decrease in urine calcium and kidney stone events over a 4-year period in adults who had kidney stones.

Title: Infertility Prevalence After Testicular Cancer
Teaser: A meta-analysis of 30 studies found low prevalence of infertility, at 14%.

Title: Can Prenatal Fish Oil Reduce AD Risk in Children?
Teaser: The mother's COX1 genotype could influence whether prenatal fish oil supplementation affects the risk for atopic dermatitis in children, a study found.

Title: UK's Hereditary Cardiac Amyloidosis Rates Higher Than Expected
Teaser: The researchers urged increased clinical vigilance for hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis in patients with symptoms or unexplained heart muscle thickening.

Title: Does Gram Stain Enhance UTI Diagnosis in the ED?
Teaser: Compared with other methods, urine Gram stain moderately predicted gram-negative bacteria but added little value to UTI diagnosis in the ED, raising questions about its clinical utility.

Title: How Can Primary Care Teams Collaborate More Effectively?
Teaser: View from the ground, by Dr Honor Merriman

Title: Meat Consumption Tied to Higher Type 2 Diabetes Risk
Teaser: Global data from more than one million people finds a significant link, particularly with processed meat and unprocessed red meat, across populations.

Title: No Mental Health Concerns With GLP-1 Receptor Agonist Use?
Teaser: Following nearly 150 reports of suicidal thoughts and self-harm linked to GLP-1 receptor agonists, the European Medicines Agency launched an investigation last year.

Title: Nearly 45% of Cancer Survivors Report Financial Struggle
Teaser: A study found that a range of factors, including younger age, lower income, advanced cancer stages, and higher social vulnerability, contributed to the financial strain.

Title: Guidelines is Going Digital in 2025
Teaser: Nina Buchan, Editor of Guidelines and Guidelines in Practice, highlights the benefits of online access as Guidelines goes exclusively digital for 2025

Title: Should Dentists Play a Role in the Battle Against Obesity?
Teaser: A survey in the United Kingdom found people are largely supportive of weight screening and offers of weight management interventions by their dental teams.

Title: Parkinson's Risk in Women and History of Migraine: New Data
Teaser: A new cohort study found no association between a history of migraine and increased risk for Parkinson's disease in women.

Title: 8 Minutes to Screen for Cognitive Impairment in Primary Care
Teaser: General practitioners found use of the Montreal Cognitive Assessment to be easy and fast, and the test had a high yield.

Title: Is Dental Work After Radiation for Head, Neck Cancer Safe?
Teaser: Post-radiation dental extractions posed an elevated risk for exposed bone and osteoradionecrosis in patients with head and neck cancer.

Title: Food Allergies Plateau But GPs Need More Tools
Teaser: Most food allergies are managed in primary care but general practitioners lack support and tools.

Title: Invasive Strategy May Not Save Older Patients With NSTEMI
Teaser: It might result in fewer non-fatal infarctions, however.
